attributes.action: URGENTLY PURSUE A NO DEAL BREXIT & DROP ATTEMPTS TO FIND AN ALTERNATIVE EU DEAL
attributes.additional_details: On 23 June 2016, 17.41 million voted to leave the EU, the biggest-ever exercise in genuine democracy in the UK. The government said: "It's your decision". They said if we voted Leave, we'd be out of the EU, Single Market & Customs Union. Some speak of 'crashing out' under a No Deal Brexit, but many others give excellent arguments on how 'No Deal' would make us prosper. The EU member states & most firms who export to the EU have already  planned for 'No Deal. We must now actively prepare for it
attributes.background: Parliament decided we’d leave the EU either with, or without, a deal.  The Prime Minister often said: “No Deal is better than a bad deal”. Leaving with no deal has great advantages. We won’t have to pay a £39 billion exit fee. We won’t be tied to EU rules. We’ll be free to make our own trade deals.
